text: Dhruvan is an Indian film actor who works in Malayalam cinema. He came into limelight through the film Queen (2018 film), directed by Dijo Jose Antony. Upcoming Movie is Khajuraho Dreams (2020). ==Career== He garnered recognition through the film Queen (2018), in which he portrayed the role of Balu, the male lead role in the film Queen, directed by Dijo Jose Antony. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
